articles.title: OnePlus rolls out April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 7T series, and Nord N100 - XDA Developers
articles.description: OnePlus has started rolling out the April 2022 security patches to the OnePlus 7, OnePlus 7 Pro, OnePlus 7T, OnePlus 7T Pro, and the Nord N100.
